full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Information**

| Field          |                   Value     |
|----------------|-----------------------------|
| **Title**      | Cancelled SFO - 01R11-23-C057 |
| **Reference Number** | PW-22-01008809         |
| **Publication Date** | September 29, 2022          |
| **Tender Closing Date** | November 8, 2022           |

**Status Update**

On September 29, 2022, a request for standing offer (SFO) was published. However, due to unforeseen circumstances, the notice has been withdrawn effective immediately. Consequently, this request is no longer active.

**Business Requirements**

The withdrawal of this request does not alter the underlying business needs, which remain unchanged.

* **Procurement Category** | SRVTGD - Procurement of goods and services
* **Trade Agreements**     | World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA); Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA); Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement; Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA); Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA); Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA); Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA); Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP); Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA); Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Location**

The procurement service is responsible for procuring goods and services for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada and has indicated that they are located in **Alberta**. Freight delivery is set to occur within the same province.

**Important Contacts**

| Field          |                   Value     |
|----------------|-----------------------------|
| **Contact Name**      | Melissa Smith         |
| **Contact Email**    | melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca |
